lines.text: It's just a dog.
So was "Cujo".
Does your dad still run the newspaper?
I'm a reporter there.
Really? Kinda like a "Jimmy Olsen" with breasts.
We need you, Harv. We Need a sheriff.
Go check the yellow pages.
Brad, You can't go in there. Let's just get help!
Who are we gonna call? Critter Busters?
I haven't seen you in a long time, peewee. How's your little space monsters?
Nana, the critters are here.
No, shit, Bradley! Damn meat eaters!
Look!
Where are they all going?
I don't know. Looks like some kind of critter convention.
What is this bullshit? Them man-eating dust mops got us roped up tighter than a blue-ribbon bull and all you folks can do is stand here and play kick-the-can with some punk kid!
You've got nothing to lose but your lives.
[Repeated line]
Kill Crites!
I gotta go where the cosmic winds blow me. I gotta go... where no man has gone before.
At the Hungry Heifer, we won't give you a bum steer.
Resurrection's in 45 minutes.
I hate teenagers.

[after the hair on it's head is blown off by Lee and it looks at it's reflection]
Bitchin'!
